name: VR Laser Noodle 2300
description:
VR Laser Noodles - pretty much says it all :)

Swipe waves of drone robots for as long as you can.  Trigger to grab the noodles.  Waves start after 15 seconds.  After every 5 waves robot count increases.  It's a bit of a workout because you can't waggle your way through it.

HTC Vive only - room scale.

Stuff to do:

Player health not fully implemented.  Also show some kind of damage indicator when hit.

Needs some sound effects/music.

Speed up robots as waves progress.

Add some way to nicely start the location of the noodles instead of just being on the floor.  Sometimes they are hard to grab.

Detect the location of the HMD vs the VR actor for room scale.

Add other VR devices besides HTC.

Swap in nice hands instead of UE defualt.

Performance/lighting so it plays ok on a 1060.
